channel.title: How to make Ryo?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "How to make Ryo?" - Share how you get mass amounts of Ryo

item.title: Re: How to make Ryo?
item.content:encoded: Necro much? In any case, ryo isn't hard to make doing the Reaper (especially Gen) and Burgerninja missions.

item.title: Re: How to make Ryo?
item.content:encoded: then you need the ryo for your sannin run, but not for your jonin exam

item.title: Re: How to make Ryo?
item.content:encoded: I don't need 500k ryo, I just need the ryo for various other things, including getting the Rack, getting J-Diddy, getting 3 hairpin pieces, and eventually for my Sannin run.

item.title: Re: How to make Ryo?
item.content:encoded: I think you're thinking of the 500k XP you need in one day for S2+ Jonin, not Ryo. 500k+ ryo is just sillyâ€¦

item.title: Re: How to make Ryo?
item.content:encoded:
Only in season 2 do you need to make 500k ryo in 1 day.

The best way for a Sp. Jonin to make ryo is to run Reaper Genjutsu missions with MC Stripeypants. There are 2 different 2,000 ryo rewards hidden there. A lot of people report averaging 10k a day.

item.title: Re: How to make Ryo?
item.content:encoded: Oh, well I need the money to be able to make the hairpin thing to double my stamina, so I can make Jonin (I'm level 40, so maybe I'm wrong, but wont I need to make like 500k xp in 1 day)?

item.title: Re: How to make Ryo?
item.content:encoded:
Just a quick question for you:
Why do you need money to become Jonin?

item.title: How to make Ryo?
item.content:encoded: Anyone able to help me? I'm trying to get enough ryo to become a Jonin, while still spending my money in massive amounts to try to get The Rack and J-Diddy. So?
